name: @porsche-design-system/react
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.build: yarn clean:build && yarn build:react-wrapper && yarn build:react-ssr-wrapper && yarn build:nextjs && yarn build:remix && yarn build:react-router
scripts.build:react-wrapper: yarn rollup -c ./projects/react-wrapper/rollup.config.js --bundleConfigAsCjs && yarn build:subPackages:global-styles && yarn build:subPackages:tailwindcss && yarn build:typings && chmod +x dist/react-wrapper/bin/patchRemixRunProcessBrowserGlobalIdentifier.js
scripts.build:typings: DEST=./dist/react-wrapper && SRC=$DEST/esm && mv $SRC/jsdom-polyfill/index.d.ts $DEST/jsdom-polyfill/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/jsdom-polyfill && mv $SRC/partials/index.d.ts $DEST/partials/esm/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/partials && mv $SRC/tokens/index.d.ts $DEST/tokens/esm/index.d.ts && mv $SRC/styles/index.d.ts $DEST/styles/esm/index.d.ts && mv $SRC/styles/vanilla-extract/index.d.ts $DEST/styles/vanilla-extract/esm/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/styles && mv $SRC/testing/index.d.ts $DEST/testing/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/testing && yarn build:typings:ag-grid
scripts.test: yarn test:unit && yarn test:e2e && yarn test:vrt
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf ./dist && yarn --cwd projects/nextjs clean:build && yarn --cwd projects/remix clean:build
